Boldur [20]: Ah, Mellka! Thank you and your friends for coming! Meet Boldur at rendezvous point, eh? We have violent science experiment to conduct, and Jennerit babies will soon be upon us!

Boldur [30]: Ah, Mellka! Welcome to Amenine Observatory! Is Boldur correct in assuming you are his reinforcements?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1B

Boldur [10]: Ah, new friends! Welcome to Amenine. Please to be meeting Boldur not far from Observatory – we have packed day of sciencing, fighting, and LAUGHING IN THE FACE OF DEATH ahead of us! (big laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1C

Boldur [10]: Yay, it is Mellka! Boldur's old friend!

Mellka [20]: Boldur, we've got help coming your way now. Where are you?

Boldur [30]: Not far! Come and meet Boldur, eh? Rendezvous point is just ahead!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1D

Thorn [10]: Boldur, come in. Your reinforcements have arrived.

Boldur [20]: Ah, little Teshka! You are Boldur's assistant for today's wildly dangerous experiment, eh? Did you bring lab coat? Goggles?

Thorn [30]: I brought none of those things.

Boldur [40]: Cool! Meet Boldur at rendezvous point, little oak!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_1A

Boldur [10]: Ah, there you are! Quickly – help Boldur deal with Jennerit baby ambush!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_1B

Boldur [10]: Hallo! I am Boldur, and these are foes Boldur is trying to crush!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_1C

Boldur [10]: Greetings, new friends! Assist Boldur in destroying Jennerit whelps! Then: WE GET TO KNOW ONE ANOTHER! (big laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_2A

Boldur [10]: Boldur is pleased to see you! Ambush means Jennerit bastards are closer to Amenine than Boldur thought. Come along to Observatory! There is SCIENCE to be done.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_2B

Boldur [10]: Thank you, friends! Now: Eldrid experiment in progress at Amenine Observatory. We must see it done, eh? Follow Boldur to Amenine!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_MissionStart_2C

Boldur [10]: Mellka! Your friends fight like many bears, combined into single bear!

Mellka [20]: I... THINK that's a compliment?

Boldur [30]: Come along! We must hurry to Observatory before more Jennerit FILTH show up!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03_ToObserv_1A

Boldur [10]: Boldur is relieved you are here. Eldrid experiment spotted by Jennerit harvest teams – send minions and various bastards to ruin Boldur's day!

Mellka [20]: Where the hell is the Observer in charge of the experiment, anyway?

Boldur [30]: She is dead! (big laugh)

Boldur [40]: Ehhh, sorry. Laughter is how Boldur grieves. Observer and Eldrid research team killed in epic shardstorm, leaving Boldur alone to complete Varelsi portal experiment. Very important to grand struggle against Varelsi. So then, here is Boldur! Risking his life for SCIENCE.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03_ToObserv_1B

Ghalt [10]: How the hell did THIS guy get put in charge of the experiment?

Mellka [20]: I don't think he was the Observer's first choice.

Mellka [30]: The whole research team was killed in the shardstorm – Boldur must've been the only survivor.

Boldur [40]: Nothing can kill Boldur! Many have tried! ALL have failed! (big laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03_ToObserv_1C

Boldur [10]: Eh, Mellka, these... friends of yours, they, uh... are not Eldrid.

Mellka [20]: Yeah, about that. Officially, I'm no longer an operative for the High Observatory. Got a little tired of the lack of action. I work for Ghalt now – I'm part of his crew.

Boldur [30]: Is this Ghalt also responsible for little oak's horrible haircut?

Mellka [40]: Uh... no, that was a choice I made.

Boldur [50]: Ah, because, heh, you look, eh... terrific! So pretty, little... Mellka. Pretty... hm.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_1A

Boldur [10]: Welcome to Amenine Observatory, site of epic Eldrid experiment into nature of spooky Varelsi portals! Experiment is nearly complete, BUT, if it is interrupted before final data transfer, all is for nothing. Wretched shardstorm, impeding march of science! Boldur HATES weather!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_1B

Boldur [10]: Behold: Eldrid science! Before she was killed by weather, Observer told Boldur, “If Varelsi portal experiment is halted, all data is lost”. We must ensure experiment completes! And kill ALL that stand in our way!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_1C

Mellka [10]: Is THAT the experiment?

Boldur [20]: It is! You can tell because of all the crazy sciency things. Now, new friends: experimental portal generator is running final test. If it is interrupted, test is a FAILURE – and all is for nothing. We must defend Eldrid portal generator!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_2A

Mellka [10]: We got hostiles making a break for the Observatory! Keep 'em away from the experiment!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_2B

Boldur [10]: Aghhh – HOSTILES! Keep bastards away from portal generator! And worry not: assisting you shall be none other than BOLDUR! (crazed laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ArriveObserv_2C

Boldur [10]: Ach, Jennerit forces detected! Ready yourself for epic defense of portal generator! Do not let bastards get close to Eldrid science!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_Def1Complete_1A

Mellka [10]: You guys alright? Because we got a bigger problem – the experiment's sucking up all the power! The whole station's about to go dark!

Boldur [20]: Worry not, friends! Backup power station not far from Amenine – we activate and transfer power to Eldrid experiment. Boldur has hands full with science, so would Boldur's new friends be so kind as to see to power station?

Mellka [30]: We're on it. You heard him – get moving to that station!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_Def1Complete_1B

Boldur [10]: YES! Violence solves EVERYTHING! (big laughter)

Boldur [20]: Ah, Amenine is losing power! Violence solves MOST things. Perhaps it can solve this as well?

Mellka [30]: What're our options?

Boldur [40]: Backup power station not far from Observatory, but I cannot activate from here. Go tend to backup power while Boldur sees to experiment, eh?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_Def1Complete_1C

Boldur [10]: Amenine is safe! Now we must deal with new problem – Amenine is losing power, and Boldur cannot activate backup power station. There must be bastards there!

Nova [20]: The walking stump is correct. Imperium forces are moving towards the power station.

Boldur [30]: If we lose power, experiment fails – and all is for nothing. Little oaks! Please beat Jennerit to pulp while Boldur sees to experiment, eh?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_ObservDef1_1A

Boldur [10]: Everyone! Hostiles at Observatory! Send them crying to Rendain, eh?!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_ObservDef1_1B

Boldur [10]: Hostiles arrive! Beat them to STUPID, DEAD PULP!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_ObservDef1_1C

Boldur [10]: Jennerit at Observatory! Protect the portal generator with Boldur – and have fun PUNCHING things with Boldur! (big laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ObservDef_Reinforcements_1C

Boldur [10]: REINFORCEMENTS! Defend experiment!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ObservDef1_Reinforcements_1A

Boldur [10]: (big laughter) Yesss! More Jennerit babies arriving soon! COME TO BOLDUR!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ObservDef1_Reinforcements_1B

Boldur [10]: Very good! More bastards incoming! Prepare for Super Crazy Fun Good Time With Your Pal Boldur, Part Two!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ToPowerStation_1A

Kleese [10]: Good news! It appears the leader of this workaday rabble is keeping the Imperium apprised via insecure comms. Let's eavesdrop, shall we?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ToPowerStation_1B

Kleese [10]: Everyone? I'm hearing some chatter on Jennerit comms. Let's listen in, eh?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ToPowerStation_1C

Kleese [10]: Ah! I've managed to break into Imperium comm frequencies, because the Jennerit are bad at computers. Hang on, I'm dialing it in now...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_ToPowerStation_2A

Supervisor Antem [10]: ... can't siege an Eldrid research outpost unless you send me reinforcements.

Supervisor Antem [20]: Oh, sure. I bet he did. Well, you can tell Rendain that if this station is so important, he can come siege it hims—

Supervisor Antem [30]: Wait, you're serious? Oh. Oh crap. Uh – ALL UNITS! TAKE OUT THAT RESERVE POWER STATION! Rendain wants that experiment eliminated!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_1A

Mellka [10]: There's the power station. Looks like we caught a break – no sign of the Imperium yet. Activate it. We need that power REALLY bad.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_1B

Boldur [10]: Ach, Jennerit reach power station first! Clear station of all miserable bastards, and we can get the proverbial party started, eh?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_1C

Boldur [10]: Yes! Now, we start up backup power generator, transfer power to Amenine. But be ready for more Jennerit bastards, yes? It will be RIP-ROARIN' GOOD TIME!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_1D

Mellka [10]: Prepare the power transfer and ready up, because you know there's gonna be more jerks to slap around before we're done here. Friggin' jerks.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_2A

Boldur [10]: Power transfer in progress! Thank you, backup power generator!

Boldur [10]: “You are welcome, Boldur!”

Boldur [10]: Ohhh, backup power generator, you naughty minx! Boldur LOVES you!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_2B

Boldur [10]: Thank you! Power transfer initialized.

Ghalt [20]: Those Imperium reinforcements are getting close! Get ready.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_PowerStation_2C

Mellka [10]: Alright. The observatory is receiving a steady power redirection. It's gonna take some time before the experiment's done, though... and the Imperium's getting closer.

Boldur [20]: Ahhh, let them come! Jennerit babies cannot stand against NEW FRIENDS OF BOLDUR! They are LEGEND!

Mellka [30]: Get ready to defend that station!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_1A

Boldur [10]: Jennerit babies! Destroy them! Defend power plant!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_1B

Boldur [10]: Power transfer in progress. Defeat all Jennerit babies until transfer completes, ya?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_1C

Boldur [10]: Jennerit babies coming to destroy power station to halt energy transfer! Fight! KILL! ET CETERA! (big laughter)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_1D

Supervisor Antem [10]: Activity detected at the backup generator. Sending reinforcements!

Mellka [20]: You got Jennerit coming your way. Guard that station!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_1E

Supervisor Antem [10]: Energy spike at the backup power outpost! Deploying reinforcements!

Boldur [20]: Oh no! More Jennerit weaklings to slaughter! (big laughter)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_2A

Mellka [10]: Power transfer complete. Energy levels are in the green.

Boldur [20]: Excellent! Now, return to Observatory – more Jennerit filth are inbound, but Boldur is busy trying to prevent Eldrid science ending the world! (chuckle)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_2B

Boldur [10]: Energy transfer complete! Experiment is safe for now. Come! Return to Amenine Observatory!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_PowerStation_Def_2C

Boldur [10]: Energy transfer is finished! Return to Observatory – much more sciencing to do, with your pal, Doctor Professor Boldur! (laugh)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09_Return1_1A

Supervisor Antem [10]: Antem to Tempest! Where are my reinforcements, damn it?!

Rendain [20]: Reinforcements are en route. I've seen to it personally. But until they arrive, we're counting on you. The Eldrid portal device MUST be destroyed.

Supervisor Antem [30]: Lord Commander Rendain?! Please don't kill me, my lord!

Rendain [40]: What? Kill you? No, don't be silly. Why would I...

Supervisor Antem [50]: All units: death march on the Observatory, NOW! OR RENDAIN WILL SURELY KILL US ALL!

Rendain [60]: (sigh) Stand by for reinforcements.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09_Return1_1B

Rendain [10]: I understand you're ill-equipped to deal with this... emerging issue. Nonetheless, you must hold. The Eldrid must not be allowed to complete their experiment.

Rendain [20]: Antem? Are you there?

Supervisor Antem [30]: (whimpering)

Rendain [40]: (sigh) You're paralyzed with fear, aren't you?

Supervisor Antem [50]: (whimpering)

Rendain [60]: Look, it's okay. Just... just take a deep breath, and...

Supervisor Antem [70]: All forces: march on the Observatory! Or Rendain will SURELY KILL US ALL!

Rendain [80]: Or that. Or you could do that.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_ObservArrival2_1A

Mellka [10]: They're readying up for another shot at Amenine – and it sounds like they're gettin' pretty desperate. That's either really GOOD, or really BAD – depends on what kinda guy this Antem is. Be ready for anything.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_ObservArrival2_1B

Boldur [10]: We can expect more Jennerit filth any moment now. Prepare yourselves for epic struggle, new friends!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_ObservArrival2_1C

Kleese [10]: Looks as though Antem means business. They're throwing everything they've got at the Observatory – prepare yourselves!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 11_ObservDef2_1A

Nova [10]: Jennerit forces inbound. Defend the Eldrid experiment.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 11_ObservDef2_1B

Mellka [10]: Jennerit forces closing in! Guard the experiment!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 11_ObservDef2_1C

Boldur [10]: Hostiles approaching! Defend Eldrid portal generator!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_MiniBoss_Arrival_1A

Supervisor Antem [10]: What? The experiment's still intact? (growl) I'm not tellin' the Lord Commander that we screwed the pooch here! Stand by, I'll handle this myself. Prepare the sentry – I'm goin' in!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_MiniBoss_Arrival_1B

Supervisor Antem [10]: No, they're still alive? How?! Don't we have... what if we sent... RRRGH, TO HELL WITH THIS! I'll deal with them myself. READY MY TANK!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_MiniBoss_Arrival_1C

Supervisor Antem [10]: Do you guys have ANY idea how hard Rendain will kill us if we FAIL?! He will kill us SO HARD, you guys!

Supervisor Antem [20]: (growl) Enough! I'll raze the Observatory to the ground myself, if I have to! Ready my battletank – I'm goin' in!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_1A

Mellka [10]: Nice work! Boldur, what's the status on the experiment?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_1B

Mellka [10]: That goon thoroughly crushed? Nice work. Boldur, where's the experiment at?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_1C

Mellka [10]: That takes care of that. Hey, where are we on the experiment? Is it finished?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_2A

Boldur [10]: Almost, little oak. Just a few seconds more, and...

Boldur [20]: (big laughter) Portal stabilized! ELDRID SCIENCE TRIUMPHS!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_2B

Boldur [10]: Just a few more seconds, and...

Boldur [20]: It worked? Oh-hoh, IT WORKED! THE ELDRID TRIUMPH! (triumphant cry)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_MiniBoss_Defeat_2C

Boldur [10]: Just a moment longer, Mellka! Dials are whizzing and beeping, and – oh, yes! Behold!

Boldur [20]: THE MIGHT OF ELDRID SCIENCE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_ExplainDataTrans_1A

Mellka [10]: Nice! So... are we done? Are we outta here?

Boldur [20]: Not... just yet. Experiment is completed, but... data cannot remain here. We must beam it offworld, but Amenine is too badly damaged. Fortunately, there is off-site communications relay. Please secure it for Boldur!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_ExplainDataTrans_1B

Mellka [10]: Whoa. It WORKED! I can't believe it.

Mellka [10]: So, now that the experiment's done, can we like... y'know, leave?

Boldur [20]: Patience, little oak. Data must be transmitted offworld first... ach, Amenine communication offline. We must use off-site comms array!

Boldur [30]: Please, run one more errand for Boldur. Go activate array and send glorious e-mail for SCIENCE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_ExplainDataTrans_1C

Mellka [10]: Awesome! Transmitting experimental data to offworld servers. And... nothing. Comms are fried. Damn it. We may have just wasted our time. And our lives.

Ghalt [20]: There's a comm relay not far away that looks like it's still online. That might be your best shot.

Mellka [30]: At this point, I'm pretty sure it's our ONLY shot. Let's hurry!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15_ToComms_1A

Mellka [10]: That shardstorm really tore this place up. There's not gonna BE an Amenine by the time we're done here... that dead Observer sure picked a helluva time to run a science fair.

Ghalt [20]: If they're as close to recreating Varelsi portal tech as they THINK they are, it's worth the risk. That's tech we can use.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15_ToComms_1B

Ghalt [10]: Ah, man. Shardstorm really tore the place up. That pal of yours is lucky to be alive.

Mellka [20]: What, Boldur? Nah, he's not lucky. He's virtually indestructible. He once survived exposure to the vacuum of space for SIX hours.

Kleese [30]: What?! How is that even possible?!

Boldur [40]: Well, Boldur is very stubborn – and death is for stupid baby cowards! (big laughter)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15_ToComms_1C

Deande [10]: Committed to their quest for knowledge, even now, on the verge of the end... how very “Eldrid” of them.

Mellka [20]: They've been at it for hundreds of thousands of years – maybe more. Why stop now?

Deande [30]: Well, we ARE on the verge of the end, as I mentioned.

Boldur [40]: Agggh! Mortal peril cannot stand in the way of Eldrid science!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_Outpost2_1A

Boldur [10]: Data thingies ready! Activate communications relay and ready yourselves for violence!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_Outpost2_2A

Mellka [10]: Relay's online... Kleese, how we lookin'?

Kleese [20]: Oh, the connection? Excellent. Perfect. Like a song. As for how we're looking , well, you should ask the scores of hostiles descending upon the comm relay. I'm guessing their answer will be “not good”.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_Outpost2_2B

Boldur [10]: Data transfer initialized! Boldur TRIUMPHS over pathetic Jennerit babies!

Nova [20]: More pathetic Jennerit babies en route to the comms relay.

Boldur [30]: Let them come! New friends shall triumph again! New friends shall be besieged by triumph! (big laughter)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_Outpost2_2C

Ghalt [10]: We're reading a steady connection, but it's gonna take a bit – and you've got the Imperium hauling ass to stop you. Defend the relay!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17_ObservDef2_Complete_1A

Rendain [10]: How is that Observatory still standing?! Get more units over there, NOW!

Rendain [20]: No, not more harvest crews, you idiot! EVERYTHING! Raze it to the ground! I WANT THAT TOWER DESTROYED!

Boldur [30]: New friends! Retreat to Observatory, where we will prepare for badass last stand! Ohohoho, yeah!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17_ObservDef2_Complete_1B

Rendain [10]: I see that young master Antem and the reinforcements I've sent weren't sufficient to seal the deal, as it were. I may not be able to stop the Eldrid from uncovering the secrets of Varelsi technology – but I can certainly kill you, and delight in the killing.

Boldur [20]: Come, new friends! Hurry back to Observatory for EPIC LAST STAND!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 18_Return2_1A

Ghalt [10]: We're detecting some pretty nasty hardware headed that way. Getting our people out alive'll be tricky if we can't break the siege.

Mellka [20]: Well, that sucks – we're barely fending 'em off as it is! Sooo... are they screwed? Probably screwed, aren't they?

Kleese [30]: Not yet! If that machine of theirs generates portals, it could be rather swiftly repurposed as an EMP device. THAT could break the siege.

Mellka [40]: Kleese, help Boldur with the preparations. Everyone else, high-tail it back to the Observatory, quick!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 18_Return2_1B

Ghalt [10]: The High Observatory just confirmed receipt of the experimental data...

Mellka [20]: That's good!

Ghalt [30]: ... as well as sensor readings of some seriously nasty firepower coming your way.

Mellka [40]: That... sucks. How the hell're we supposed to get outta here?

Kleese [50]: If that machine of theirs generates portals, it could be rather swiftly repurposed as an EMP device. That could break the siege!

Ghalt [60]: Make the preparations. The rest of you, get back to the Observatory before the reinforcements show up!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 19_EMP_Intro_1A

Kleese [10]: Everyone safely back at Amenine? Good! Now, for the EMP. Boldur: disengage the portal device's field inhibitors!

Boldur [20]: Boldur is doing the thing you said to do.

Boldur [30]: Ah, yes! Inhibitors disengaged!

Kleese [40]: Now we just need to let the energy build to critical levels before we initiate the discharge.

Boldur [50]: More Jennerit babies, inbound! Defend portal machine at all costs!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 20_EMP_Wave1_End_1A

Boldur [10]: Eh... new friends? Varelsi portals are opening up everywhere! It is like horror jamboree! When will science save us?!

Mellka [20]: The EMP is still charging! Don't let 'em near the portal generator while it spins up – we're almost through this!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 21_Boss_Arrival_1A

Kleese [10]: Portal device is nearly at maximum energy throughput! Oh, I hope this works...

Mellka [20]: “Hope”?! You mean you don't KNOW this will work?

Kleese [30]: Don't know how you got THAT impression! Anyway, I'm initiating the discharge in three... two...

Kleese [40]: (terrified scream) What the hell is THAT?!

Mellka [50]: Kleese! The EMP! NOW!

Kleese [60]: I can't! The Conservator's locked down the whole Observatory! You MUST kill it! Quickly!

Boldur [70]: Boldur was JUST GOING TO SUGGEST THAT! (war cry)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 22_MissionEnd_1A

Mellka [10]: It's dead – and we've got control back! Boldur, discharge the EMP, now!

Boldur [20]: Boldur smashes ALL THE BUTTONS!

Mellka [30]: Did it work? Did we do it?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 22_MissionEnd_2A

Boldur [10]: (victorious laughter) THE ELDRID TRIUMPH! For once. AND IT'S ALL THANKS TO BOLDUR! (big laughter)

Mellka [20]: Boldur, it's... ugh, whatever. Yes. All thanks to Boldur.

Mellka [30]: Ghalt, they're out of the woods. Ready for extraction.

Ghalt [40]: Nice work, Mell. We're on our way.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Antem_ArtilleryStrike

Supervisor Antem [10]: Readying artillery strike!

Supervisor Antem [20]: Artillery strike armed and ready!

Supervisor Antem [30]: Launching artillery strike!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Antem_Pain

Supervisor Antem [10]: Rrrgh...

Supervisor Antem [20]: Nghhh!

Supervisor Antem [30]: Rghah!

Supervisor Antem [40]: Agh... rrgh!

Supervisor Antem [50]: NO!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Antem_PlayerKill

Supervisor Antem [10]: Yeaaah!

Supervisor Antem [20]: Wooohooo!

Supervisor Antem [30]: (triumphant laugh)

Supervisor Antem [40]: Nnngh! Yeah!

Supervisor Antem [50]: Take that!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Antem_PlayerTaunts

Supervisor Antem [10]: I'm gonna bury you in the friggin' desert!

Supervisor Antem [20]: Rendain's gonna give me a medal for this!

Supervisor Antem [30]: For the Imperium! For my Lord Commander!

Supervisor Antem [40]: I'll vaporize you rat bastards!

Supervisor Antem [50]: I'll eat you jerks alive!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Antem_TargetCores

Supervisor Antem [10]: Targeting the Observatory's power cores!

Supervisor Antem [20]: Say goodbye to those power cores!

Supervisor Antem [30]: I'll burn those cores to the ground!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_FinalBoss_OpenPortals

Boldur [10]: Void-bastard is opening portals! Incoming horror jamboree!

Mellka [10]: He's opening more portals! Watch your back!

Ghalt [10]: More Varelsi portals opening up! Be careful!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_FinalBoss_ShieldDown

Boldur [10]: Varelsi shield DOWN! Strike now!

Mellka [10]: The Conservator's shield is weakened! Hit it now!

Mellka [20]: Its shield just crapped out! Attack now!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_FinalBoss_TakeEquipment

Boldur [10]: Ach, void-bastard locking down more equipment! We must stop it!

Boldur [20]: Void-bastard is taking over more equipment! Punch it MANY times!

Mellka [20]: It's going after more tech! Stop it!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_FirstDef_Health25

Boldur [10]: Portal generator nearly destroyed! FIGHT! FIGHT NOW WITH BOLDUR!

Mellka [10]: The experiment can't take much more of that!

Mellka [20]: Get 'em off the experiment! If it goes down, we lose everything!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_FirstDef_Health75

Boldur [10]: Jennerit at experiment! Please to be killing, immediately!

Boldur [20]: Experiment is taking damage! Boldur weeps for science!

Boldur [30]: Keep Jennerit bastards away from experiment!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CallOut_OutpostHealth_Damaged

Boldur [10]: Oh no! Jennerit babies beating crap out of comm station! Boldur asks you: BEAT CRAP OUT OF THEM!

Mellka [10]: Comm relay's taking damage! If the Imperium destroys it, we're hosed! Keep 'em back!

Boldur [20]: Comm relay under attack! Boldur requests immediate defense!

Mellka [20]: Relay's taking a beating – keep the Imperium off of it!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CallOut_OutpostHealth_Dying

Boldur [10]: Signal is holding, but Boldur worries for comm station! Defend, damn you!

Mellka [10]: That's not good – defend the comm relay!

Boldur [20]: (panicked yelp) Comm station is nearly exploded into tiny pieces!

Mellka [20]: Oh crap, oh crap – comm relay's almost toast!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PowerStation_Health25

Mellka [10]: Watch out! The power station's almost toast!

Mellka [20]: Keep 'em off the generator! The experiment's SCREWED without that extra juice!

Mellka [30]: We can't take much more of this! Defend the station!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PowerStation_Health75

Boldur [10]: Backup power station suffering epic beating!

Boldur [20]: Power station is besieged by Jennerit bastards!

Boldur [30]: Defend power station, new friends! Boldur would VERY MUCH appreciate it!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PowerStation_NewWave

Nova [10]: Jennerit reinforcements inbound to your location.

Boldur [10]: Excellent fighting and punching, new friends, BUT – more bastards arriving shortly!

Mellka [10]: Nice work, but we got more of 'em comin' in – get ready!

Ghalt [10]: Don't relax yet – you got more reinforcements comin' your way!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CallOut_TransStat_half

Boldur [10]: Data transmission is at 50%. Transmit faster, stupid data!

Mellka [10]: We're halfway there – just hang on!

Boldur [20]: Experimental data halfway transmitted. Continue fighting! Boldur believes in you!

Mellka [20]: Data transmission's hit 50%. Keep fighting!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CallOut_TransStat_NearComplete

Boldur [10]: Transmission almost complete! Boldur thanks you for suffering on his behalf!

Mellka [10]: Upload's nearly complete. Hold tight!

Boldur [20]: According to blinky status bar, transmission is nearly complete!

Mellka [20]: Almost there! Hang on!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

name: The Saboteur
text:
|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1A

Deande [10]: According to these schematics, the vulnerable terminal is in the Foundry up ahead.

Ghalt [20]: We got a small window before the Jennerit get wise to what we're up to. Move quickly.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1B

Deande [10]: We'll take the ship to a safe distance and make the preparations for the upload.

Nova [20]: Wait, they're not there already? F*ck's sake. I am so ready. I am so ready for this away mission.

Deande [30]: Better get moving. Nova's... eager to get started.

Nova [40]: I AM SO F*CKING READY.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1C

Ghalt [10]: We'll take the ship to a safe distance. Remember – the ship is just a vessel. Without the brains, it can't fly.

Nova [20]: That's me. I'm the brains. Because I'm way smart, you guys.

Nova [20]: Sorry, I'm just really excited for this mission.

Ghalt [30]: Anywayyyyy. The sooner we get this done, the sooner we all get out of here. Get movin'.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1D

Nova [10]: According to Deande's intel, a vulnerable terminal can be found not far from your location. Bring me to it, and I'll kick the door in. Figuratively speaking.

Nova [10]: Because I don't have legs, because I'm a Magnus.

Nova [10]: Anyway, go, or whatever.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1E

Kleese [10]: There's a vulnerable terminal a stone's throw away. Haul ass, as the saying goes! Haul ass and hack terminals, to use the, eh, less frequently invoked version of the expression!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1F

Nova [10]: A vulnerable terminal can be found not far from your location. There you can create the uplink, and we can get this party started.

Nova [10]: Hey.

Kleese [20]: Yes, Nova?

Nova [30]: I'm really excited.

Kleese [40]: (sigh) And I'm excited for you.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1A

Nova [10]: Are you there yet?

Deande [20]: They are not there yet.

Nova [30]: (impatient groan)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1B

Nova [10]: How about now? Deande. Deande. Where are they now?

Deande [20]: They are... not at the terminal yet.

Nova [30]: DEANDE, THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1C

Nova [10]: Deande. Deande.

Nova [10]: I am so excited.

Deande [20]: I know! I'm excited FOR you.

Nova [30]: (gleeful giggle)

Deande [40]: N-Now I'm... kinda freaked out.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1D

Nova [10]: (gleeful giggle)

Ghalt [20]: I've never heard her do THAT.

Kleese [30]: Yyyeah, that was weird.

Nova [40]: (giggle) AWAY MISSIONS!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1E

Kleese [10]: Is it really an away mission if you aren't actually outside?

Mellka [20]: Wow, Kleese. Wow. That's REALLY nice.

Kleese [30]: Honest question!

Nova [40]: I yearn to feel grass beneath my feet, and the wind in my hair.

Nova [40]: But I guess this'll be nice, too.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1F

Ghalt [10]: If the Imperium doesn't already know we're here, they sure as hell will once Nova starts diggin' into the network. She's stored locally in that terminal – if it goes down, she goes down with it. After all, there's no “backing up” a Magnus.

Nova [20]: Thank you for reminding me of my mortality shortly before my mission, Captain. Really. I mean it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_ToFirstTerminal_1G

Benedict [10]: Aw man, Nova, just wait till you experience it. Bein' outside the ship? It's somethin' ELSE.

Nova [20]: Tell me. Tell me about being outside.

Benedict [30]: Well, there's... I mean, it's... well, there's a LOT of it! Don't really know where to start! Y'know what? You're just gonna have to see it for yourself, girly.

Nova [40]: Hnnng, I'm so excited.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03a_DoorLocked_1A

Deande [10]: The way forward is shut – but there's a control terminal nearby that'll open up some doors for you. Find it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03a_DoorLocked_1B

Deande [10]: Get to the control terminal and deactivate security. Then you'll be able to move forward.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03b_Arrive_Foundry

Deande [10]: There's the Foundry. The vulnerable security terminal is inside.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03c_Arrive_SecurityTerminal_1A

Deande [10]: Take out the guards, quickly. I'd say “quietly”, but that's not really our strength, as a... as a team, I guess.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03c_Arrive_SecurityTerminal_1B

Deande [10]: Get rid of the guards, won't you?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03c_Arrive_SecurityTerminal_1C

Ghalt [10]: There's the terminal. Get rid of those guards before you kick off the upload.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03c_Arrive_SecurityTerminal_1D

Nova [10]: Please kill those guys as fast as you can so you can upload me into that terminal. Now. Do it now. Right now. Why haven't you done it yet? Do it now.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03c_Arrive_SecurityTerminal_1E

Deande [10]: Just take out the guards, and we'll be ready to upload Nova into the network.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_Secure_Network_1A

Deande [10]: You've secured the terminal. Standby – we're about to upload Nova to the refinery network.

Nova [20]: Woo! Away mission!

Nova [20]: Say, aren't those hostiles?

Deande [30]: Defend the terminal while we upload the Magnus!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_Secure_Network_1B

Deande [10]: Nova, are you ready?

Nova [20]: I am so ready.

Deande [30]: Initializing the upload now...

Ghalt [40]: Agh, dammit – we got hostiles coming in! Defend the terminal – if we break connection, we lose Nova!

Nova [50]: On field trip day? Nooooooo!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_Secure_Network_1C

Mellka [10]: Initializin' the upload. Be safe, Nova!

Nova [20]: It's not about being safe, Mellka. It's about risking your life on a badass away mission.

Mellka [30]: Speaking of risking your life, we've got company closing in!

Deande [40]: Defend the terminal until Nova's safely in the system!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_Secure_Network_1D

Ghalt [10]: Upload Nova to the network, Kleese.

Kleese [20]: On it. This won't hurt a bit, Nova.

Nova [30]: Don't worry, coach. I can take it. Put me in.

Deande [40]: Uh – guys? Jennerit forces closing in!

Ghalt [50]: As expected. Defend the terminal till the transmission's completed!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_Secure_Network_1E

Nova [10]: Upload initialized. Transmission in progress. Imagine a progress bar here. Just picture it in your mind.

Nova [10]: Hey, wouldn't now be an inconvenient time to be besieged by hostile forces?

Nova [20]: Hostile forces, inbound! Defend the network terminal!

Nova [20]: Wow, that went south quick.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DefendTerminal_1A

Deande [10]: The upload's about halfway there. Hold tight, and defend that terminal!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DefendTerminal_1B

Kleese [10]: The upload's 50% complete – not much longer now. Keep watch over that terminal; you've got more jerks inbound!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DefendTerminal_1C

Mellka [10]: Upload's halfway done. More hostiles incoming! Guard that terminal!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DefendTerminal_1D

Ghalt [10]: Nova's at the halfway mark, but we got more Jennerit comin' your way. Defend the terminal!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1A

Nova [10]: I am so here right now. Woo! AWAY MISSION!

Ghalt [20]: What's next, Deande?

Deande [30]: Get moving to the core. It's in the heart of the refinery. That's where we'll trigger the meltdown.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1B

Nova [10]: Upload complete. This system's... roomier than I expected. And it smells weird. And I miss my stuff, and my friends. But still. Awesome.

Deande [20]: Next stop's the refinery core. That's where we'll trigger the meltdown. Get moving.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1C

Nova [10]: Upload complete. I am all up in this computer, fellas.

Mellka [20]: While Nova's working the system, you get over to the reactor core. Together, you'll trigger the meltdown.

Nova [30]: Like a team! Doing teamwork!

Kleese [40]: You do realize this technically qualifies as terrorism, don't you?

Nova [50]: (giddy giggle) Teamwork.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1D

Nova [10]: Upload complete. I've gained preliminary access to the refinery's network. I'm playing Solitaire. Doing pretty good, too.

Nova [10]: What're you guys up to?

Deande [20]: Nova's ready. Now get over to the reactor core to initiate the meltdown.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1E

Toby [10]: Upload complete! You okay in there, Nova?

Nova [20]: I'm better than okay, Toby. I am free.

Deande [30]: Now that Nova's in the network, we're ready to initiate the meltdown. Get moving to the reactor core.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_UploadComplete_1F

Reyna [10]: Transmission's done. How you feelin', Nova?

Nova [20]: Like I can fly, Reyna. On the wings of freedom.

Deande [30]: Now that Nova's in the network, we're ready to initiate the meltdown. Get moving to the reactor core.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_RefineryAlarm_1A

Security [10]: Unauthorized access detected. Security breach. Security breach.

Nova [20]: My fault. Turns out “password” wasn't the password. Wait, I know.

Nova [30]: “password12345”...

Nova [40]: Damn. These guys are good.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_RefineryAlarm_2A

Ghalt [10]: We'll have to disengage the lockdown to get access to the reactor core. There's a control room nearby – that's probably our best bet.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_RefineryAlarm_2B

Kleese [10]: Great. So how do we get to the reactor core now?

Nova [20]: We'll need to trigger a manual override at the control panel. I'm there now. Waiting for you.

Nova [20]: Jeez, everything's so slow in meatspace.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_RefineryAlarm_2C

Mellka [10]: Damn, the whole place is locked up tight. How're we getting to the core?

Deande [20]: We hit the manual overrides. There's a control console not far away. Nova, can you meet them there?

Nova [30]: I was really enjoying exploring the digital frontier, but... eh, fine.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_ControlRoomGate_1A

Deande [10]: The control room's behind that gate. Find the power source and get those locks open.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_ControlRoomGate_1B

Reyna [10]: Control room's behind that gate. Gotta get those locks open.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_ControlRoomGate_1C

Toby [10]: RRRGH, FRIGGIN' LOCKED DOORS! I mean – let's find the power source and disable this gate! How 'bout it, guys? (nervous giggle)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09a_VarelsiEncounter_1A

Deande [10]: Varelsi? NOW? Well, it's clear that the jig is definitely up. Kill those monsters and secure that control console!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09a_VarelsiEncounter_1B

Nova [10]: That command console can initiate the manual override sequence. Secure the control room while I prepare to hack the planet.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09a_VarelsiEncounter_1C

Benedict [10]: Is that the control console? The one swarmed by the Varelsi?! SWEET, 'cause I TOTALLY wanna KILL one of those things!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09b_VarelsiCleared

Deande [10]: Well done. The console is near the back – power up the transmitter and Nova can get to work.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_1A

Deande [10]: Let's get these defenses softened up. Nova, are you ready?

Nova [20]: Ready to breach on your command.

Ghalt [30]: Get started. We'll keep an eye on you out here.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_1B

Reyna [10]: Alright – Nova, we ready to go?

Nova [20]: Ready to breach on your command, Reyna.

Ghalt [30]: Go get 'em, girl! We'll cover you!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_1C

Toby [10]: Ms. Nova! If you're not too busy, are you ready to initiate the breach? Sorry, nevermind, you probably ARE busy having fun and stuff.

Nova [20]: Oh no, it's cool! I always have time to blow stuff up. Ready to breach on your command, you little cutie-patoots.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_2A

Kleese [10]: More of them coming in! Hold on, Nova!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_2B

Toby [10]: Reinforcements! (anxious wail)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10a_DefendControlRoom_2C

Reyna [10]: Crap, we got more of 'em comin' this way!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10b_VarelsiMaligner_1A

Deande [10]: Is that Varelsi... ABSORBING those thralls?

Kleese [20]: It's growing stronger with every thrall it takes! Kill them before it has a chance!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 11_CityUnlocked_1A

Deande [10]: The way is open! Make haste to the reactor core – our task is nearly complete!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_ToReactorCore_1A

Deande [10]: Nova doesn't get a chance to get outside the ship terribly often, does she?

Ghalt [20]: Since we've been working together, Nova's never been outside the ship at ALL, come to think of it.

Nova [30]: We never do anything fun. But this? This is way fun.

Deande [40]: Rather... spirited, isn't she?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_ToReactorCore_1B

Reyna [10]: Hey Ghalt? Remember the first time we sabotaged a Jennerit facility together? Damn, those were good times.

Ghalt [20]: Uhhh, I need more. Which time was that?

Reyna [30]: Y'know, after the... after the THING. That thing I did that one time.

Kleese [40]: What the hell's she on about?

Ghalt [50]: Oh. I chased Reyna around for a couple of weeks after she boarded and captured a UPR flagship cruiser. And because she's Reyna, she hid the ship on Tempest.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_ToReactorCore_1C

Reyna [10]: And YOU were so preoccupied striking a blow against Rendain that you forgot ALL about that whole “treason” thing. (chuckle) So predictable, Ghalt.

Toby [20]: Magnuses are really, really, REALLY fascinating, when you think about it, you guys.

Nova [30]: Aw. Thank you, Toby.

Toby [40]: Don't thank me! Thank the crazy almost-friggin'-magical black box process that created you! It's so cool! No two Magnuses are the same! And you guys can't be copied! And you're constantly evolving! What's that even like?!

Nova [50]: You frighten me. Anyway, it's a lot like having a thousand voices screaming in your head at the speed of light, and all of them are yours, and all of them are pissed. That's what it's like for me, anyway.

Marquis [60]: She's not lying, that's for sure! (manical laughter)

ISIC [60]: Yeah, that's the long and short of the experience.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_ArriveReactorCore_1A

Deande [10]: Capture the station, and we'll initiate the meltdown sequence.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_CaptureReactorCore

Kleese [20]: The rest of you: keep the Jennerit away from the console while Nova finishes her work!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_CaptureReactorCore_1A

Deande [10]: It's your time to shine, Nova! Initiate the breach and upload the worm cluster!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15a_DefendReactorCore_1A

Ghalt [10]: Nova? What's your status?

Nova [20]: Worm cluster upload at 50%.

Ghalt [30]: Alright. We're almost outta here. Stay sharp and buy Nova the time she needs!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15b_ThrallBoss_1A

Deande [10]: You have to find some way to destroy that armor of his.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15b_ThrallBoss_1B

Deande [10]: That thrall captain is heavily armored – you'll need to find some way to weaken his plating!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15b_ThrallBoss_1C

Kleese [10]: Wear down his armor! Somewhere beneath it all's a vulnerable, fleshy Thrall screaming for death!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15c_ThrallBoss_Intro_1A

Nova [10]: That enemy corresponds to no known Thrall in our Jennerit personnel databases.

Kleese [20]: Well, it's definitely a Thrall, but those modifications... you know what? Screw scientific inquiry. Just kill it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15c_ThrallBoss_Intro_1B

Kleese [10]: Oh dear! They're sending... it's a... what the hell happened to that Thrall, anyway?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15c_ThrallBoss_Intro_1C

Kleese [10]: Normally I'd be quite curious about... whatever happened to that Thrall, but he's in our way. Slay the crap out of him!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15d_ThrallBoss_Drones

Kleese [10]: He's deploying drones! Watch yourselves!

Kleese [20]: Drones incoming!

Kleese [30]: The bastard's deploying a gaggle of drones!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15e_ThrallBoss_Mines

Kleese [10]: That device will continue crapping out mines until you do something about it. Do something about it!

Nova [20]: I'd recommend killing it before it fills the room with deadly mines. Hurrah. I'm being helpful.

Kleese [20]: Destroy that mine launcher! Mines are hazardous to your health, I'm told!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15f_ThrallBoss_Phantom_Invulnerability

Kleese [10]: What the hell? Nova's detecting some sort of anomaly!

Kleese [20]: Something's happening... the bastard's completely shielded!

Kleese [30]: Attacking won't do any good! That Thrall's protected by, uh... impossible science!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15g_ThrallBoss_Phantom_Transform_1A

Nova [10]: The Thrall is transforming. Kleese, please advise your comrades what to do next.

Kleese [20]: HOW THE HELL SHOULD I KNOW?! KILL IT!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15g_ThrallBoss_Phantom_Transform_1B

Kleese [10]: He's phasing somehow! Kill those phantoms!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15g_ThrallBoss_Phantom_Transform_1C

Kleese [10]: Kill those scientifically improbable monstrosities!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15h_ThrallBoss_Phantom_Return

Kleese [10]: He's back! Take him out!

Kleese [20]: The Thrall's reformed! Rip him to shreds!

Kleese [30]: Now's your chance! Kill the wretched thing!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_ReactorCoreDefended_1A

Nova [10]: Upload complete. Reactor core meltdown initialized. Begin running for your lives in three... two...

Security [20]: Core meltdown imminent. Evacuate. Evacuate. Evacuate.

Ghalt [30]: Everyone: haul ass to the rendezvous point! We're gettin' outta here!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_ReactorCoreDefended_1B

Deande [10]: The worm cluster's uploaded! Nova, transfer back to the ship. We won't have much time before—

Security [20]: Core meltdown imminent. Evacuate. Evacuate. Evacuate.

Deande [30]: —That. B-Before that happens. Rendezvous at the ship! We're getting the hell out of here!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17_ReachLZ

Deande [20]: We're clear! Nova, trigger the reactors!

Nova [30A]: Stand by for a series of huge, satisfying explosions.

Nova [30B]: Stand by for a bunch of stuff blowing up because I'm the BEST!

Nova [30C]: Reactor overload imminent. Wait for iiiit...

Ghalt [40]: Oh, HELL YES!

Kleese [50]: YESSSSS! YOU DID IT, NOVA!

Nova [60]: I did. I did do it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17_ReachLZ_1A

Deande [10]: Climb aboard!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_CoreDamage

Nova [10]: You do realize the ship won't fly without me, don't you? Defend the terminal!

Ghalt [10]: Heads up! Hostiles going after the terminal!

Kleese [10]: ALL HANDS! ENEMIES AT THE TERMINAL! GET YOUR ASSES OVER THERE!

Nova [20]: Ow. Ow. Terminal under attack. Ow. I'm not actually feeling pain, but I CAN die. Ow.

Ghalt [20]: Everyone! Defend the terminal! Nova's still working on the breach!

Kleese [20]: The uplink terminal's under attack! If it falls, Nova's lost forever!

Nova [30]: Enemy forces are handing me my digital ass. Defend the terminal.

Ghalt [30]: Nova needs more time! Defend the terminal!

Kleese [30]: (shriek) Hostiles at the uplink terminal! We must defend Nova!

Nova [40]: Hostiles at the terminal. C'mon, guys. Don't let me die. I love you.

Nova [40]: Sorry, that was weird.

Nova [50]: Enemy forces at the terminal. Defend your Magnus. That's me. Hi!

Nova [60]: If you guys aren't too busy, you might consider stopping these jerks from killing me.

Nova [70]: Please defend the terminal. In case you forgot, I'm your ride home.

Nova [80]: Ow. Ow. Damn. S**t. Ow. Help. Ow.

Nova [90]: Defend the terminal. If I die, you're all screwed.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

Deande [10]: Get that door open!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Door_1B

Deande [10]: Get that door open, won't you?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Switch_1A

Deande [10]: Hit that switch!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_Switch_1B

Deande [10]: Hit that switch, won't you?

Kleese [10]: I've... never seen floors flash before, but I can't imagine that's a good thing. Steer clear of it!

Kleese [20]: What the devil is going on down there?! Stay clear of that floor!

name: The Heliophage
text:
|| SECTION: 01_Intro

Deande [20]: One moment... I've almost got it...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1A

Mellka [10]: Deande? We need some lights.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_1B

Galilea [10]: I am consumed by darkness... but quite literally, this time!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Intro_2A

Deande [10]: When this lift arrives at its terminus, we'll be within reach of the Cathedral of Lenore. That's where we'll find the Heliophage... and Rendain.

Mellka [20]: But before we can get you in, we gotta bring down the defenses – that's step one. Hope you guys're ready.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_PlatformArrival_1A

Deande [10]: Mellka and I are working on a route inside the Heliophage – but we have to disrupt the defenses first. Seek out the shards powering this station's defenses and destroy them!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_PlatformArrival_1B

Mellka [10]: Holy crap. The star...

Mellka [20]: Are we too late?

Deande [30]: Not yet. The factions are fighting to give us this chance. And their sacrifice will mean nothing if we fail.

Deande [40]: We'll ready the teleporter to get you inside. Wreck those defenses! Find and destroy those shards!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03_ToFirstShard_1A

Rendain [10]: Welcome... to the Cathedral of the Sustaining Mother, and the end of our journey together.

Rendain [20]: I'd welcome you inside, but I imagine you're here to stop and/or kill me.

Mellka [30]: Yep. That's the idea.

Rendain [40]: And this is the part where I beg you to reconsider, followed by your vigorous rejection of my offer?

Kleese [50]: We reject your offer! And vigorously!

Rendain [60]: Hah! Splendid. I admire your spirit!

Rendain [70]: Let's see how far spirit can take you.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_FirstShard_1A

Deande [10]: We can't break up those massive shards on our own. If Ghalt and Kleese aren't too busy with the fleet, maybe they can help out. I'll order in some support – get that locking mechanism disabled and expose the shard!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_FirstShard_1B

Deande [10]: Those shards are massive! We won't be able to break them up without some help. I'll try to get a harvest drone sent down – in the meantime, get the locking mechanism disabled!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_FirstShard_1C

Deande [10]: You won't be able to break up that shard without a harvest drone. I'll get in touch with the UPR fleet and arrange for some support. In the meantime, get that locking mechanism disabled!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DisengageLock_1A

Deande [10]: Captain, do you read? We need some help with a particularly GARGANTUAN shard.

Ghalt [20]: Deploying a harvester drone – should be planetside in two shakes. You guys doin' alright down there?

Mellka [30]: We're survivin'. How about you?

Kleese [40]: We're all going to DIE! (sobbing)

Ghalt [50]: What he means is, we're doing great, and we're behind you 100%.

Ghalt [50]: By the way, if I sound way too calm right now, it's because THIS is how I deal with terror.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DisengageLock_2A

Kleese [10]: Your harvester's arriving! Look after it – it's INCREDIBLY expensive!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DisengageLock_2B

Ghalt [10]: Harvester arriving at LZ. Keep an eye on it while it does the job!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_DisengageLock_2C

Mellka [10]: Harvester's arriving! Keep an eye on it and get those shards!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_Countdown_Low_1A

Kleese [10]: Solus has only minutes before the final phasing begins! What's your status?!

Mellka [20]: We're ready for transport – everyone, get back to the central platform, quickly!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_Countdown_Low_1B

Deande [10]: We're running out of time – Solus has only minutes left!

Ghalt [20]: Then you guys better hurry! Get in there and take Rendain out!

Deande [30]: Rally at the central platform! Our window of opportunity is closing quite rapidly!

Deande [30]: Also, we're going to die – so, y'know, hurry!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_TeleportReady

Deande [10]: We're all set – and just in time, too. You're first through the gate. Mellka and I will be right behind you.

Deande [20]: Rendain will NOT be pleased to see you. I hope you're prepared... Mellka? If you'd do the honors?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09_TeleportNotReady

Deande [10]: Is that everyone? That's not everyone.

Deande [10]: HEY! GET OVER HERE, NOW!

Deande [20]: Screw it, they'll have to take the slightly more painful way inside. The rest of you are going now – Mellka and I will be right behind you. Mellka, initiate transport!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_Teleporting

Deande [10]: Here goes nothing...

Deande [20]: Now go kick that monster's ass!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 11_Heliophage

Rendain [10]: Hmmmm. Clever.

Deande [20]: Did it work? Are they alive?

Rendain [30]: For the moment.

Ghalt [40]: Did you make it inside?! What's your status? REPORT!

Rendain [50]: Your friends are going to die, Captain. And it's all your fault.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_FirstRetreat_1A

Rendain [10]: You're strong... that much is certain. Unfortunately for you, I'm quite desperate to succeed – and pride is not my weakness.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 12_FirstRetreat_1A

Rendain [20]: The Heliophage must not be stopped! KILL THEM NOW!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_PortalDirection_1A

Deande [10]: Reinforcements will continue to spill out of those portals until they're closed. The Heliophage is equipped with emergency field dampeners – they require a lot of power, but they should be capable of closing those portals!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 13_PortalDirection_1B

Mellka [10]: Crap, here comes lots of reinforcements! How do we close those portals?!

Deande [20]: Activating the Heliophage's emergency field dampeners should do the trick – but they require a lot of power.

Kleese [30]: Good thing thralls explode into shards upon expiry! Get those portals closed, gang!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_FirstReturn_1A

Rendain [10]: Solus is doomed. There is nothing you can do. There is nothing ANY OF US can do. SUBMIT TO THE INEVITABLE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_FirstReturn_2A

Mellka [10]: We made it! Keep him busy while we deal with the machine!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 14_FirstReturn_2B

Deande [10]: We're inside! Keep Rendain busy while Mellka and I work on the Heliophage!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15_SecondRetreat_1A

Rendain [10]: You IDIOTS! Clinging to your false hope, turning your back on the only path left to us! Enough – THIS ENDS NOW!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 15_SecondRetreat_2A

Mellka [10]: Uplink established! Kleese – do you have it? Can you stop it?

Kleese [20]: Yes, but I need time – stand by!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 16_SecondReturn_1A

Rendain [10]: Do you have any idea what I've done to save my people? What I WILL do?!

Mellka [20]: Oh man, he looks PISSED.

Rendain [30]: ANY DEED! ANY PRICE!

Rendain [40]: WE ARE SUSTAINED!

Mellka [50]: Oh yeah. He's REAL pissed!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17_FinalPhase_1A

Kleese [10]: Heliophage, uh... rejiggered. But it might be too late.

Mellka [20]: “Rejiggered”?!

Kleese [30]: YES, REJIGGERED! CLEARLY I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I'M DOING RIGHT NOW!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17A_WarpBegin

Kleese [10]: Everyone? What's happening? Where'd you go?!

Kleese [20]: What's going on?! We've lost sensor tracking! It's as though the lot of you disappeared!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17B_VarelsiSpace

Kleese [10]: I can't believe it! Do you have any idea where you are right now?!

Kleese [20]: Good heavens, it defies description! Never thought I'd see it with my own eyes!

Kleese [30]: You lot are straddling the very stuff bordering our universe from their own. Be ready for anything! This is UNCHARTED TERRITORY!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17C_WarpEnd

Kleese [10]: You're alive! Inexplicably! Oh, thank heavens!

Kleese [20]: Captain! They've returned!

Kleese [30]: Captain! Crew has returned from the maw of the void or wherever the f**k they just were.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17D_RendainFight_FirstFightIntro_1A

Rendain [10]: I'm sorry, but I cannot permit you to intervene any further, so I've brought you... here.

Rendain [20]: A bit bleak, I know. You probably wanted to die somewhere a bit... brighter. But I'm afraid this is where it ends. Here... in the dark.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17D_RendainFight_FirstFightIntro_1B

Rendain [10]: Ah, there you are. Welcome... to the void.

Rendain [20]: The darkening of Solus mustn't be disrupted, so I've brought you HERE, to the realm of the Varelsi. I know it's a rather lonely place, but you won't die alone. I'll be watching. The Varelsi too! And, isn't that nice of us?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17D_RendainFight_FirstFightIntro_1C

Rendain [10]: (menacing laugh) Why hello there. Welcome... to the END!

Rendain [20]: I figured you've come all this way, the least I can do is show you the future you won't live to experience. Welcome to Varelsi space – a refuge for some, but for you? Well... like I said, I'd rather just show you.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17D_RendainFight_FirstFightIntro_1D

Rendain [10]: (menacing laugh)

Rendain [10]: Hi.

Rendain [20]: I've pretty much hit my limit on this heroism bulls**t. Welcome to the realm of the Varelsi. Take it all in, because it's the last thing you'll see with your eyes STILL IN YOUR HEAD!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17E_RendainFight_FirstFightStart

Rendain [10]: Now then... let's begin, shall we?!

Rendain [20]: Well, I'm ready. LET'S GET THIS OVER WITH!

Rendain [30]: Now then... let's FINISH THIS!

Rendain [40]: Come! Show me your strength! SHOW ME YOUR RESOLVE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17F_RendainFight_FirstFightEnd

Rendain [10]: Very good! Very good indeed. But alas, I'm quite desperate to succeed, and pride is not my weakness.

Rendain [20]: Very good. Admirable. But unfortunately, I've worked too hard to get here. And now that we're here, I can show you what my effort has wrought!

Rendain [30]: You're proving to be a far greater nuisance than I expected. So what say we skip straight to the part where I summon a cavalry of nightmares and finally put an end to this?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 17G_RendainFight_BossPhaseStart

Rendain [10]: (menacing chuckle, fading into maniacal laughter)

Rendain [20]: The Varelsi chose the Jennerit. They chose ME. And now, I WILL SHOW YOU WHY!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 18_RendainDefeated

Rendain [10]: Don't you see? We needn't all perish... we can save something...

Rendain [20]: What value is life that is already condemned? What are you fighting for?!

Deande [30]: Now's your chance! Give the BASTARD what he's been after – open up a Varelsi portal!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 19_RendainBanished

Caldarius [10_BB]: So long.

Orendi [10_BB]: See you in hell, Mr. Vampire.

Deande [10_BB]: Any deed. Any price.

Thorn [10_BB]: For the lost! FOR SOLUS!

Rath [10_BB]: I've waited a long, LONG time for this, Rendain.

Boldur [10_BB]: Here! ALLOW BOLDUR!

Marquis [10_BB]: Auf wiedersehen!

Kelvin [10_BB]: (roar)

El Dragón [10_BB]: FROM THE TOP ROPE!

Montana [10_BB]: Heh-heh! See ya, chump.

Phoebe [10_BB]: It appears the honor's mine.

Oscar Mike [10_BB]: Heh-heh! So long, Dracula!

Mellka [10_BB]: Go to hell!

Ghalt [10_BB]: Let's finish this.

Toby [10_BB]: Sorry about this!

Benedict [10_BB]: Y'all have fun in the abyss, now!

Reyna [10_BB]: Score's settled!

Whiskey Foxtrot [10_BB]: Oh yeah. This is gonna be good.

Attikus [10_BB]: YOU AFRAID?! I SAID, ARE YOU AFRAID?!

ISIC [10_BB]: Don't feel bad, big guy! None of this is real.

Ambra [10_BB]: Begone!

Kleese [10_BB]: (snoring loudly)

Kleese [10_BB]: What?! Oh, right!

Miko [10_BB]: (laughter)

Galilea [10_STG1_BB]: My regards to your masters!

Shayne [10A_BB]: Have fun in V space, Rendain!

Rendain [20]: RRGGGGHHAAAAAAGGGHHHH!
