Rendain [10]: Deploy the warp anchors! Reinforcements, NOW!

Rendain [20]: Summon the armies! DESTROY THE BATTLEBORN!

Rendain [30]: Send in the troops! THIS ENDS NOW!

Rendain [40]: DEPLOY THE ANCHORS! KILL THEM NOW!

Rendain [50]: ANCHORS! SEND THE ANCHORS!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ExplosionAttack1_1A

Deande [10]: What in the hell was that?!

Rendain [20]: A gift from our benefactors. The Varelsi are capable of wonders. HERE! LET ME SHOW YOU!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ExplosionAttack2_1A

Deande [10]: He's charging up again! Find some cover!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ExplosionAttack2_1B

Mellka [10]: Rendain's building up for another energy blast! Get some cover!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ExplosionAttack2_1C

Deande [10]: Take cover! Rendain's charging up for another blast!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_HarvesterDeployed_1A

Kleese [10]: Deploying harvest drone! Stand by!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_HarvesterDeployed_1B

Ghalt [10]: Hang tight! We're sending in a harvester!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_HarvesterDeployed_1C

Kleese [10]: Another harvester is en route! Hang tight!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PortalReminder_1A

Deande [10]: Hostiles will continue pouring from those portals until you close them! Activate the dampeners!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PortalReminder_1B

Mellka [10]: You gotta do something about those portals! Get those dampeners online!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_PortalReminder_1C

Deande [10]: Build those field dampeners and get those portals shut! They'll just keep coming until you do!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_BossDeploy

Rendain [10]: Very good. But not good enough.

Rendain [20]: You remember when THIS maniac tried to kill you? I do too! Let's relive that moment together, shall we?

Rendain [30]: I don't need to kill you myself. I have people for that.

Rendain [40]: (growl) Something a little more challenging, then?

Rendain [50]: My benefactors have whipped up something special for you. Be a dear and allow this to kill you.

Rendain [60]: Make this quick.

Rendain [70]: You are all doomed to the dark.

Rendain [80]: I've plucked this one directly from your deepest nightmares. That's a metaphor, of course, but... whatever. Kill them!

Rendain [90]: Bring me their hearts.

Rendain [100]: (chuckling) No, no, I'm afraid it's not over yet!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_BossKilled

Rendain [10]: Hmph. Clever.

Rendain [20]: Not bad.

Rendain [30]: A pity. I rather liked that one.

Rendain [40]: No, no, don't – get up! GET UP, YOU WASTE!

Rendain [50]: Damn it! Where the hell did you people COME FROM, anyway?!

Rendain [60]: (growl) YOU MISCREANTS!

Rendain [70]: My, wasn't THAT violent?

Rendain [80]: Such a waste. Eh, whatever.

Rendain [90]: STOP KILLING EVERYTHING! (frustrated roar)

Rendain [100]: DAMN IT! DAMN IT! DAMN YOOOU!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_PlayerKilled

Rendain [10]: (maddened cackle)

Rendain [20]: Oops. I'm afraid that was my bad.

Rendain [30]: You've brought this upon yourselves.

Rendain [40]: (chuckle) Pathetic.

Rendain [50]: You've lost. Care to know why?

Rendain [60]: (big laugh) Are you, are you kidding me right now?

Rendain [70]: (gasp) Delightful.

Rendain [80]: (big laugh)

Rendain [90]: It's just – that – simple.

Rendain [100]: Give up! Give up NOW!

Rendain [110]: I'm afraid there's much more death where that came from.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_PreBanish

Rendain [10]: No... it can't end like this! Not now! Solus... SOLUS WAS IN MY GRASP!

Rendain [20]: You can't... nggh... you can't fight forever. Nothing... NOBODY can stop the Varelsi...

Rendain [30]: Do you have... tch... do you have any idea what you're about to do? What you've already done?!

Rendain [40]: You're killing yourselves... do you understand that? Do you know what you're doing?!

Rendain [50]: The Varelsi will never stop. And they WILL win. And we... all of us... will die...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_Retreat

Rendain [10]: (pained roar)

Rendain [20]: (pained roar)

Rendain [30]: (pained roar)

Rendain [40]: (pained roar)

Rendain [50]: (pained roar)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_RendainFight_Return

Rendain [10]: Surprise! IT'S ME AGAIN!

Rendain [20]: MY TURN!

Rendain [30]: ENOUGH!

Rendain [40]: ENOUGH!

Rendain [50]: ENOUGH!

Rendain [60]: Solus is doomed. There is nothing you can do. There is nothing ANY OF US can do. SUBMIT TO THE INEVITABLE!

Rendain [70]: You IDIOTS! Clinging to your false hope, turning your back on the only path left to us!

Rendain [70]: Enough! THIS ENDS NOW!

Rendain [80]: Do you have any idea what I've done to save my people? What I WILL do?!

Rendain [90]: ANY DEED! ANY PRICE! WE ARE SUSTAINED!

Rendain [100]: I'm sorry – you thought we were finished? No! Not yet!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ReturnToCenter

Deande [10]: Heliophage defenses powered down! Now we should be able to...

Mellka [10]: That's it! Defenses are offline! Now we just gotta get you inside.

Deande [20]: Heliophage defenses powered down! Now we should be able to... oh, crap. Power surge at the Heliophage!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ShardUpdate_Destroyed

Rendain [10]: Your efforts are commendable. Your valor is proven. But in the end, it was simply not enough.

Deande [20]: Don't listen to him! Get your ass back to the central platform – next stop, the Cathedral of Lenore!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ShardUpdate_Halfway

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ShardUpdate_OneLeft

Phoebe [10]: Damn it, the defenses remain intact. We must blow up more expensive-looking equipment, immediately.

Mellka [10]: Defenses are still up... I think one more shard should do it. Find it!

Deande [20]: The defenses are still holding! There should be one more shard left standing. Find it and destroy it!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ShardUpdate_SeveralLeft

Deande [10]: Excellent. But the defenses are still holding – see to the other shards!

Mellka [10]: Nice work, but the defenses are still active – go find the other shards!

Deande [20]: That's one. Several more to go – move quickly! Solus doesn't have long!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ThrallGuards_1A

Rendain [10]: Thralls! Destroy them!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ThrallGuards_1B

Rendain [10]: Kill them now. Kill them NOW, damn you!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ThrallGuards_1C

Rendain [10]: Screw this. More Thralls!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ThrallGuards_1D

Rendain [10]: All forces! KILL THE BATTLEBORN!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_ThrallGuards_1E

Rendain [10]: Reinforcements: bring me their hearts!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_VarelsiGuards

Rendain [10]: Ah, it's our benefactors! And just in time.

Rendain [20]: All will give the dark its due.

Rendain [30]: Rally to me, nightmares!

Rendain [40]: Damn it! I need reinforcements! I WILL NOT—

Rendain [40]: Ah, Varelsi! How lovely.

Rendain [50]: I WAS going to let you live, but alas, the Varelsi don't understand mercy.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_WarpChatter_1A

Mellka [10]: Are you sure this is gonna work?

Deande [20]: Mellka, darling – I know I'm new here, but since when has the crew of the Nova ever traded in certainty?

Mellka [30]: Fair point.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Callout_WarpChatter_2A

Deande [10]: I think I broke it. Did I just BREAK it?! Did I just doom the star?!

Deande [20]: MELLKA, PLEASE SAY SOMETHING TO ME RIGHT THIS INSTANT!

Mellka [30]: What? No, you're good. You just – here, let me get that.

Deande [40]: It's not broken? I didn't just screw us all?

Mellka [50]: Not yet.

Deande [60]: (sigh) If you'll excuse me for a moment, I need to find some corner to quietly vomit in.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1A

Rendain [10]: It's good to see you again, Deande. Though I wish it were under better circumstances.

Deande [20]: Allow us inside the Catherdal and come quietly, Lord Commander. You must answer for your crimes.

Rendain [30]: My actions are justified by the Precept. That which has guided the destiny of the Jennerit since our emergence. Yes, there were some casualties –

Mellka [40]: “Some casualties”?! All those systems, those COUNTLESS lives—

Rendain [50]: “Countless”? There is a number, you know. One I reflect upon every day. One larger than you can imagine. (weary sigh) I've been at this for a very long time.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1B

Rendain [10]: What exactly do you hope to accomplish here?

Mellka [20]: The separation of your ugly head from your miserable body, for starters.

Rendain [30]: An Eldrid of all people should understand. The cosmos is old. Frail. No matter what we do, it will end, and everything that we are will be lost. But with the Varelsi, something of us can be preserved. Is that not worth the price we've all paid? Is that not worth everything?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1C

Deande [10]: The Varelsi needn't win, Lord Commander. We can stop them – we can save Solus together.

Rendain [20]: Oh, can we? That never occurred to me. Oh, if only your desperate plea just a bit earlier, the destruction of hundreds of inhabited systems could've been avoided!

Rendain [30]: I'm being VERY sarcastic right now.

Deande [40]: These people have shown me true strength. They can fight.

Rendain [50]: The Varelsi cannot be defeated. And even if they could, they aren't the only nightmares lurking out there in the dark. Our benefactors are... they are merely the devils we know.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1D

Kleese [10]: I say, if we're all about to die – Mellka, there's something I simply must tell you.

Mellka [20]: What? Now?!

Kleese [30]: Yes, NOW! (sobbing) I love you! I've always loved you!

Mellka [40]: I, uhh...

Kleese [50]: (uncontrollable laughter)

Mellka [60]: I f**kin' hate you, Kleese.

Kleese [70]: Hah, hah! Even at the end of all things, we do have fun, don't we?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1E

Mellka [10]: Captain, how's it goin' up there?

Ghalt [20]: Rough, but we're holding on. Everyone's giving it all they got. The UPR, the Eldrid, the LLC – the Jennerit rebels even paired up with the Rogues. I've never seen anything like it.

Kleese [30]: I suppose we all have a vested interest in our success. I'll happily resume my old hatreds if we succeed, but until then, uh... I... believe in you? Go team and such?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1F

Deande [10]: The Empress is dead. The Precept was a lie. What I've done, what I've failed to prevent, is unforgivable. So, uh... sorry about that.

Mellka [20]: Don't sweat it.

Deande [30]: I'm sorry, what?

Mellka [40]: We've all made mistakes, we're all screw-ups. Especially Kleese.

Kleese [50]: She's not wrong!

Mellka [60]: But all that matters now is that you're here, with us. We're in this together. Y'got me?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1G

Oscar Mike [10]: All units: SOMEONE PLEASE COMFORT ME IMMEDIATELY.

Montana [20]: Hey man, don't you worry. We got this. Y'know why?

Oscar Mike [30]: Because we're... because we're too awesome to die?

Montana [40]: Damn straight, buddy. We are WAY too awesome to die!

Oscar Mike [50]: SUPER BEST FRIENDS FOR LIIIIIFE! (sobbing)

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1H

Rendain [10]: Ah, Rath. Here we are, together again. Come for another chance at slaying me?

Rath [20]: IT IS LITERALLY ALL I THINK ABOUT, YOU MONSTER!

Thorn [30]: Control yourself, Rath. You'll have your chance.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1I

Phoebe [10]: Excuse me – Lord Commander? Since you're available, I simply must tell you: this Heliophage of yours? It's a piece of s**t.

Rendain [20]: You must be Phoebe.

Phoebe [30]: Did the Varelsi deliver the engineering schematics in crayon? Or did you draw them up yourself after that “way cool dream” you had or whatever? Oh, you know, after you had the fever and ate a whole pizza by yourself? Oh, you were so sick, oh my GOSH.

Phoebe [40_ALT]: And in the haze of it all, you thought, “I know! I'll just slap some old PC parts and vacuum cleaners together, bind it all with duct tape, and trip and fall through the laws of physics like a BLUNDERING LUMMOX”?!

Phoebe [40]: And in the haze of it all, you thought, “I know! I'll just slap some stuff I found together, bind it all with f***ing duct tape, and bring in some interns to figure out the details”?!

Rendain [50]: Well, THAT'S a rather baseless assumption you're making...

Phoebe [60_ALT]: YOU MADE GARBAGE, YOU... UNDERGRADUATE!

Phoebe [60]: YOU MADE S**T, YOU... UNDERGRADUATE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1J

Phoebe [10]: How much better do you think you'll have it with the Varelsi?

Rendain [20]: We will be alive. And we will bathe in the light of a thousand suns.

Phoebe [30]: Pshhh, for a few billion years. But even the stars the Varelsi claimed will wither and die. All you're doing is buying time.

Rendain [40]: Yeah. I'm biologically immortal, so that's sort of a big deal with me.

Phoebe [50]: In a closed system, entropy can only increase. That's the one law that hasn't been broken.

Rendain [60]: Hmph. If I can't break the law, I'll break free of the system.

Phoebe [70]: But that's stupid and IMPOSSIBLE!

Rendain [80]: With the time I'll have, NOTHING is impossible.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1K

Rendain [10]: You think you're free, but you're not. You're subject to the same tyranny as the rest of us – the tyranny of the closed system, as it were. The only difference between us is that I found a way out. It makes sense that you're... jealous.

Reyna [20]: Jealous? Why the hell would I be jealous about that? You turned lap-dog to interdimensional cosmic nightmares to save your own ass. You sold out your allies. And you're gonna have to live with that for the rest of your unnatural friggin' life. And I hope it tears you up inside.

Rendain [30]: Mmmmm, nope. I'm actually pretty okay with living with it, because I'll be LIVING with it, which is more than I can say for your lot.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1L

Toby [10]: Um... Mr. Lothar Rendain, sir? I, uh... there's something I wanted to talk to you about, and... y'know what, no! I'm manning the f*ck up! LISTEN UP, RENDAIN! YOU LISTENING TO ME?!

Rendain [20]: Who is THAT?

Toby [30]: My name is Toby! I'm a survivor of Menneck-B, and I'm here to hand you your ass for darkening my world!

Rendain [40]: Oh my god – Deande, where did you find this little fellow? Isn't he just the most ADORABLE thing you've ever seen?!

Toby [50]: No, no! We're not doin' that right now! We are SO not doin' that right now!

Rendain [60]: Now you, little master, I'm very excited to meet. Do you like dogs? I've got a little fellow here by the name of Constable Cuddles who I think you would just LOVE to play with.

Toby [70]: Shut your F**KIN' FACE, you vampire-lookin' DOUCHEBAG! RRRRGH! SCREW the star! Berg and I are gonna tear your guts outta your stomach and HANG you with 'em!

Rendain [80]: Oh, he's so mad!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1M

Orendi [10]: Hey Rendain. Hey. Hey! HEY! Rendain!

Rendain [20]: Yes?

Orendi [30]: I love you.

Rendain [40]: Uh... that's nice.

Orendi [50]: I love you SO MUCH, I wanna crush your skull between my hands, and sing CREEPY LULLABIES to you as you are WHISKED AWAY to an ENDLESS ABYSSSSS!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: CombatConvo_1N

Ambra [10]: Experiencing a bit of déjà vu, Galilea? It's been some time since we walked the elite city together.

Galilea [20]: Let us wait until our job is done before we reminisce about the past.

Ambra [30]: Oh come on now, we had some good times here together, didn't we? Well, I think we did!

Galilea [40]: We did – leaving aside, of course, my botched Sustainment, and subsequent descent into mind-shattering darkness. All of which, I'll remind you, was YOUR doing.

Ambra [50]: Perhaps this ought to wait until after, eh?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

name: Attikus and the Thrall Rebellion
text:
|| SECTION: Slums_BinkIntro

Attikus [10]: It's the kinda night the whole planet's looking to chew you up and use your femur as a toothpick. Tempest... a giant fist hanging in space, in search of a face to punch. Maybe mine. But somewhere deep in this city, there's another fight brewing.

|| SECTION: Slums_01_MissionStart

Nova [10]: Welcome to Battleborn Operations. You have chosen “Attikus and the Thrall Rebellion”. Complete optional objectives to gain Ops Points and unlock increased difficulty modes for greater rewards.

Nova [20]: Loading narrative feed and splicing with simulation replay...

Nova [1]: Welcome to the simulation room, Commander. The hardlight technology in here allows me to generate digital holo-reconstructions of just about anything, but I really want to stress that nothing you're about to see is real. Kleese tried to live in here after he discovered it could replicate the beach resorts of Luxuria 6, and it took us a week to flush him out.

Nova [2]: The program you are about to enter is Attikus' account of the Third Thrall Rebellion on the planet Tempest. It's supposed to be therapeutic for him, but as you're about to see, he's taking some... creative liberties with it.

Nova [3]: As you run the simulation, look for chances to earn Ops Points, up to a maximum of fifty for your first playthrough. Increased Ops Points means higher difficulty and greater rewards such as titles and customizations.

Nova [4]: Good luck, Commander. Beginning simulation in three, two, one...

Nova [5]: Welcome back to the simulation room, Commander. Since this is your second time back, you will now begin with five Ops Points, and be able to earn up to fifty five. Earning forty Ops Points will unlock a shiny new skin for your character, and there are even greater rewards later on.

Nova [6]: Attikus says you played along nicely last time, but there's more to the story... a lot more. Since this is his little party, I'll let him explain.

Nova [7]: Welcome back to the simulation room, Commander. You're really getting the hang of this. This is your third playthrough, meaning you begin with ten Ops Points and can reach a maximum of sixty. If you haven't already, you can earn a new character skin at forty and the title of “Slumlord” at fifty. Get all the way to sixty, and you'll unlock a Commander Loot Pack!

Nova [8]: Attikus says there's something weird going on, like there might be someone else in here with you. It's not my job to keep track of you people – go check it out for yourself.

Aria [10]: Enough of this! I'll wipe you and your mongrel uprising off the map before you get close to our stronghold. Prepare the neo-titan cannons aboard the Exodus for surface bombardment!

Aria [20]: What?! What do you MEAN they've been decommissioned? Where did they go?!

Deande [30]: An entire branch of your orbital defense grid went missing and it escaped your notice? How clumsy.

Aria [40]: Damn you! I'll take care of you myself!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_Nar10_E

Aria [10]: Miserable whelps! I'll destroy this entire city before I hand control of it over to you! The very idea of your feral minds at the reins of our Imperium makes me sick!

Deande [20]: Well, in case we weren't completely sure she'd gone mad by now, she's overriding the safeguards on the ultrafusion reactor beneath the Silent Sister stronghold. On the plus side, if we don't stop her, we'll soon be part of a shiny new ring system around Tempest.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_Nar10_F

Attikus [10]: All of those who have been known as Thrall, hear me! I am Attikus, the fist of liberation, smasher of bonds, and pulverizer of faces!

Attikus [20]: For generations, with a whip in one hand and a leash in the other, the Imperium has screamed: “YOU MUST!”

Attikus [30]: This war is for your very right to exist! The right to chase our own destinies! The right to twist the whip back around the necks of our oppressors and say to them, “I AM!”

Attikus [40]: The Jennerit used to be afraid of us – we, who were born deadly! We whose broken backs formed the foundations of their towers! Let's show them the price of forgetting their nightmares!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_OpComplete

Oscar Mike [10]: Hell yeah! Woo! That. Is. What. I'm. Talkin' about! So – was that how it really went down?

Attikus [20]: I don't know. I actually can't remember the details anymore. I run this simulation to try and get the feeling I had in those moments. But this time, fighting alongside my friends, this was the closest I think I'll ever get. Thank you for joining me in the fight.

Deande [30]: What are you boys up to in the holo-sim room? You've been in here for four hours.

Attikus [40]: Nothing! Just... going through some old memories.

Oscar Mike [50]: And making new ones! Yeah!

Oscar Mike [51]: Hey! Can someone, uh... can someone get me down? I'm scared!

Oscar Mike [52]: Uh, this is new. Oscar Mike can fly! Hey Benedict, SUCK IT!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_CallOut_ResetOpsPoints

Nova [10]: Activate my hologram to reset your Ops Points.

Nova [20]: Combat too intense? Reset your Ops Points here.

Nova [30]: Use me to reset your Ops Points back to zero.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_CallOut_ResetOpsPointsSuccess

Nova [10]: Ops Points reset to zero.

Nova [20]: Ops Points cleared.

Nova [30]: Your Ops Points have been reset. Get back on that ladder!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_CallOut_ExplainOpsPoints

Nova [10]: Completing side objectives rewards you with Ops Points.

Nova [20]: Ops Points can be gained by completing side objectives and uncovering loot caches.

Nova [30]: The more Ops Points you collect through side objectives and loot pickups, the harder the challenge!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_CallOut_LootTierUp

Nova [10]: Your reward tier has increased – keep it up!

Nova [20]: Your Ops Points score has made you eligible for better loot! Nice!

Nova [30]: Higher reward tier reached. Good job!

Nova [40]: You've reached a new reward tier for accumulating Ops Points!

Nova [50]: New reward tier achieved! Oh frabjous day! Callooh! Callay!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Slums_CallOut_LootTierMax

Nova [10]: You have reached the maximum Ops Points reward tier. Amazing!

Nova [20]: Maximum reward tier achieved. Hot dang!

Nova [30]: You've maxed out our reward tier! I'm looking at it and the damn thing is broken! Look what you did! I mean, you still get the loot and whatever, I'm just saying that fixing this is really going to eat into my weekend.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

name: Toby's Friendship Raid
text:
|| SECTION: Ops_Intro

Nova [10]: Welcome to Battleborn Operations, where the elite meet to earn sweet, sweet Ops Points that you can trade in for new stuff – because no matter how many eons pass in the universe, one truth remains: stuff equals happiness! You've selected Toby's Friendship Raid.

Nova [20]: You're about to help Toby recover his mech suit, Berg, which was actually stolen by... whoa, Nova, you almost spoiled the entire story. That was a close one. The point is that Toby needs our help, and who could say no to that adorable little guy? And don't forget those shiny Ops Points.

Nova [30]: Good luck. Beginning operation in three, two, one...

Nova [40]: Welcome back. You will now begin with five Ops Points and be able to earn up to fifty. Earning forty Ops Points will unlock a new skin for your character, and there are even greater rewards later on. I've seen some of them, and seriously guys, as soon as I'm done telling you about Ops Points, I'm gonna get me some. Plus, Toby still needs your help.

Nova [50]: Hey there, champ. You're doing great – I mean that. This is your third playthrough, so you begin with ten Ops Points and can reach a maximum of sixty. If you haven't already, you can earn a new character skin at forty and the title of “Penguin Master” at fifty. Get all the way to sixty, and you'll unlock a Commander Loot Pack!

Nova [60]: There you are. Wow, I must say that no one destroys ships like you. You really must want to help Toby find his stolen mech suit... or love those sweet, sweet Ops skins. Either way, keep going!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Mission_Intro

Reyna [10]: We're about to drop you off on a factory ship convoy hurtling through the Detritus Ring at unthinkable speeds. Try not to think about it.

Reyna [20]: The fleet was stolen by a rogue LLC employee, AND he kidnapped Toby! So let's rescue everyone's favorite penguin and stop this LLC reject before he causes any more trouble. Valkyrie out.

Reyna [30]: The fleet was stolen by a rogue LLC employee, and we think he's building an army to take over Solus. Let's find out what this LLC reject is planning and stop him. Valkyrie out.

Reyna [40]: The Detritus Ring is our home, Rogues. Let's take this convoy out!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 01_Elevator

Reyna [10]: Take that elevator down to the hangar.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02_SecurityBots

Reyna [10]: You tripped the alarms!

Reyna [15]: Take out those security bots!

Reyna [20]: Get back on that elevator and head to the lower decks.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02A_Transport

Nova [10]: Shut down the cargo transport system.

Nova [20]: There's the transport control – turn it off.

Nova [30]: That did it! Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02B_LootRooms

Nova [10]: Check the nearby cargo holds for any valuable cargo. That seems self-explanatory, but you never know.

Nova [20]: Looks like that cargo hold was a bust. Try the other one.

Nova [30]: Oh shiny loot, come to mama! Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02C_Turrets

Nova [10]: Build some turrets to help you take out those bots. I'd like to see that.

Nova [20]: One turret down, one to go.

Nova [30]: That's two for two. Way to rain down hellfire on those robots. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02D_BulwarkBots

Nova [10]: Bulwark bot incoming. Try to damage him with a critical hit and make mama proud.

Nova [20]: Nice hit, but you'll need to damage him with a crit. You didn't listen. You never listen.

Nova [30]: Good kill, but no crit shots. Objective failed. Zero Points. I know, I'm sad too.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02E_Elites

Nova [10]: Detecting an Elite. Try to kill it without getting stunned. You're not pretty when you're stunned.

Nova [20]: I said, “don't get stunned”. Now I have to look at you all stunned and confused. Objective failed. Zero Points.

Nova [30]: Nice kill. I mean that. Really, I do. Ops Point awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 02F_Ronin

Nova [10]: Ronins in the area. Try to win a duel by killing one with a melee strike.

Nova [20]: Close, but not really. You have to kill that last Ronin with a melee strike, or you get nothing. Nothing!

Nova [30]: You didn't kill either one with a melee. Objective failed. Zero Points. That was literally seconds of your life wasted.

Nova [40]: Great kill shot. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03_Hanger

Reyna [10]: Clear out the hangar – we've got to get to the engine room!

Reyna [20]: Nice work! Now keep moving.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03A_DockingPort

Nova [10]: Close off the docking ports! We don't want any ships escaping, now do we?

Nova [20]: One docking port down, one more to go.

Nova [30]: Docking bay sealed. I'm surprised and impressed. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03B_Drone

Nova [10]: Build a drone for backup, will you please?

Nova [20]: Drone secured. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03C_Loot

Nova [10]: I'm detecting some sort of storage room nearby. Pillage it for loot, because loot makes the world go round!

Nova [20]: Storage room unlocked. Now grab that loot.

Nova [30]: Loot secured. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03D_Beastmaster

Nova [10]: Thrall Beastmaster in the area. Kill him before he escapes.

Nova [20]: There's the Beastmaster. Take him out quickly, now.

Nova [30]: The Beastmaster escaped. Wow. Just wow. Objective failed. Zero Points awarded.

Nova [40]: Beastmaster down. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03E_Boombots

Nova [10]: Boombots incoming. Avoid taking any damage from them and I'll grant you some shiny Ops Points.

Nova [20]: Even more boombots are incoming. Don't let them hit you – they have space cooties.

Nova [30]: I told you not to let the boombot hit you. Now you have space cooties. Objective failed. Zero Points.

Nova [40]: Boombots destroyed. Wowie. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 03F_Bonecrusher

Nova [10]: Detecting a Thrall Bonecrusher. I double-dog dare you to kill him with a skill.

Nova [20]: That Bonecrusher is almost dead. Finish him off with a skill.

Nova [30]: Bonecrusher down, but you didn't use a skill. Objective failed. Zero Points awarded. Nova sad.

Nova [40]: Great skill kill. I'm... happy. You thought I was going to say thrilled, didn't you? Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04_ShipEngines

Reyna [10]: We've got to slow down the ship. Disable those engines!

Reyna [20]: Okay, that's one engine down! Two more to go!

Reyna [30]: Nice! Just one more!

Reyna [40]: That's all three! Time to take this ship out!

Reyna [50]: Engine's still going... must be another shard powering it.

Reyna [60]: That engine isn't disabled! Find the other shard.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04A_DataTerminals

Nova [10]: Detecting some data terminals nearby. Hack them to totally mess up their systems. Wouldn't that be fun?

Nova [20]: That's one terminal down. Now hack the others.

Nova [30]: Just one more data terminal to go.

Nova [40]: Great job. They are as hacked as they are ever going to be. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04B_Turrets

Nova [10]: Make yourself useful and build some turrets to help secure the engine room.

Nova [20]: That's one turret. One more to go.

Nova [30]: Engine room secured. That's better. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04C_Varelsi

Nova [10]: Picking up a bizarre Varelsi energy signature. Investigate it, would you?

Nova [20]: There's the signal source. Scan it. Scan it now.

Nova [30]: That was enlightening. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04D_Brute

Nova [10]: Some Brutes are patrolling the engine room. Clear them out. No survivors.

Nova [20]: One Brute down. Now get the rest.

Nova [30]: Hunt down that final Brute – for me.

Nova [40]: Brutes cleared. Nova happy. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04E_TimeChallenge

Nova [10]: Sure are a lot of minions in here. I'll bet you some Ops Points you can't kill 10 in 30 seconds.

Nova [20]: Sure are a lot of minions in here. Try to kill 10 in 45 seconds, why don't ya?

Nova [30]: 30 seconds left.

Nova [40]: 20 seconds left. You are running out of time.

Nova [50]: 10 seconds. I thought you'd be done by now. Boy, did I overestimate your skills.

Nova [60]: Five.

Nova [70]: Four.

Nova [80]: Three.

Nova [90]: Two.

Nova [100]: One.

Nova [110]: (buzzer) Wow, what an abject failure. Abject means total, by the way. Zero Points awarded.

Nova [120]: You smash robots real good! Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 04F_Bonecrusher

Nova [10]: Picking up a Thrall Bonecrusher in the area. Try to take him out.

Nova [20]: Looks like that Bonecrusher won't go down without a fight. So bring it!

Nova [30]: Bonecrusher down. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 05_BotFactory

Reyna [10]: The factory should be just up ahead.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06_StopBot

Reyna [10]: They're using the Toby mech as a prototype to build an army. We can't let that happen.

Reyna [20]: Take out this mech factory's power supply.

Reyna [30]: One down, one to go.

Reyna [40]: That'll do it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06A_LootCache

Nova [10]: Detecting a sweet, sweet loot cache nearby. Try to open it up.

Nova [20]: That did the trick. Now grab that loot.

Nova [30]: Loot secure. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06B_Barrels

Nova [10]: Why would anyone store so many explosive barrels in one room? I mean, honestly. Blow them all up and make mama proud.

Nova [20]: I love it when things go boom. Always have. Don't know why. Is that wrong? Oh well, now find the rest.

Nova [30]: No more barrels. Well, the fun had to end sometime. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06C_DataTerminals

Nova [10]: Unsecured data terminals nearby. Hack their systems.

Nova [20]: One terminal hacked. Get the rest.

Nova [30]: One terminal left. Track it down.

Nova [40]: That's all the data terminals. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06D_Elites

Nova [10]: Elite bot detected. Take it out without getting stunned.

Nova [20]: You got stunned, son. Objective failed. Zero Points awarded.

Nova [30]: Elite bot down. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 06E_Assassins

Nova [10]: Ronin bots nearby. Try to kill one with a skill, please.

Nova [20]: Ronin down – but you didn't use a skill. Try again.

Nova [30]: Ronins gone, but you didn't use a skill for the killshots. Objective failed. Zero Points.

Nova [40]: Great kill. Ops Points awarded.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 07_FindMech

Reyna [10]: Keep going – we need to find that guy in the mech suit!

Reyna [20]: Destroy those shards to take out the shields.

Reyna [30]: You'll need to take out some of the shards to drop that defense shield.

Reyna [40]: That shield ain't going down until those shards are destroyed.

Reyna [50]: Great job – that shield is down! Keep going.

Reyna [60]: Another shield down! Almost there.

Reyna [70]: Looks like the way is clear. Time to find the guy in the mech suit.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 08_DestroyMech

Reyna [10]: Stop that mech!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 09_Powercores

Reyna [10]: You need to destroy the ship – we can't risk a single one of Toby's mechs escaping.

Reyna [20]: Take out those shards and you'll overload the cores.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: 10_Escape

Reyna [10]: Ha-HA! Time to get out of here!

Reyna [20]: Head to the escape pods!

Reyna [30]: Nice work! Let's catch up to the next ship.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_A

Reyna [10]: My tracker's picking up signs of Toby! Toby, are you there? What happened?

Toby [20]: A maniac seal ambushed me on Bliss! When I woke up I was cold and alone... Reyna... HE STOLE BERG! I'm freakin' out here! I FEEL SO NAKED!

Reyna [30]: And there goes my left ear. We're coming, Toby. Hang tight.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_B

Toby [10]: Reyna?

Reyna [20]: Toby, I...

Toby [30]: HE STOLE MY MECH SUIT! Where are you?! WHERE ARE YOU?!

Reyna [40]: And there goes the other ear.

Reyna [50]: Toby!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [60]: Hardly. This is Thaddeus Wishingbone, future Emperor of Solus. Doesn't my spiffy new death suit make you want to pee all over yourself in a whirl of jealousy and fear? This suit's going to come in handy when I take over Solus, but you won't be around for that historic moment as you will be dying... momentarily.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_C

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Mmm, by the way, when I stole this ship I renamed it “The Pinniped's Lament”. I thought you would like to know the name since you're going to die here. 'Kay.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_D

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Ooh, good to put a face to the name, Reyna Valeria. Nice command glove. Fine craftsmanship.

Reyna [20]: Oh, I ain't got time for you right now, whatever your silly-ass name is.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_E

Reyna [10]: We're coming for you, Thaddeus. And we're gonna wreck ya.

Thaddeus Wishingbone [20]: Mmmm, agree to disagree.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_F1

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: I must admit. I find myself beside myself. If you continue into my disincentivization hallways, you will find your end uncomfortable and your funeral uncatered.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_F2

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Hmm, I'm not surprised you got through. I used Thrall contractors on that first hallway. Their work can sometimes be shoddy, but they're cheap, and I used the budgetary surplus to purchase an additional underwater castle for my pet catfish, Whiskers. He never plays there, stupid catfish. Actually I misspoke – it's a goldfish. Does that matter? Sorry.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_F3

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: You know, when I took command of this ship, my first act was to increase the standard issue disincentivization chambers by a hundo percent. They called me... mad. But who's laughing now? (cough) I had a spicy sandwich for lunch.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_F4

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Oh, if you think you're going to make it out of here alive with your little penguin friend, you are sad-ly mis-tak-en.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_F5

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Thaddeus Wishingbone.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_G1

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Oooh, welcome to my death arena. It's sparse, but then again that cuts down on carcass disposal costs. En garde!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: — Or whatever, I don't care.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_G2

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Ughh, stupid malfunctioning mech suit, if your diminutive penguin friend had just cooperated and given me the full schematics, you'd be burnt toast by now.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_G3

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Now I'm getting a little tee'd off cause I'm a busy seal and it's a lot of work to take over the last star of a dying universe, you guys, so please die now.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_G4

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Uhngh, ngh... AGHHHHH! Hrk...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_H

Reyna [10]: According to my tracker, Toby should be on the other side. Let's get him out of here.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_H2

Toby [10]: Let me out of here, RIGHT NOW!

Toby [20]: Help! SAVE ME!

Toby [30]: Hey! Over here!

Toby [40]: Get me outta here!

Toby [50]: Thanks! Wow, I thought I was a goner!

Toby [60]: We've got to get out of here!

Toby [70]: Come on! This way.

Toby [80]: Thanks for saving me. Sorry if this is interrupting your day or something.

Toby [90]: I owe ya one.

Toby [100]: There are the escape pods. Let's go!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar01_I

Toby [10]: Thanks for saving me, Reyna.

Reyna [20]: No problem, buddy.

Toby [30]: Now let's catch up to that next ship! WE GOTTA SAVE BERG!

Reyna [40]: And... now I'm deaf. But glad you're safe, Toby.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_A

Reyna [10]: Welcome back, Toby. Now...

Toby [20]: REYNA, WE'VE GOT TO GET BERG BACK!

Reyna [30]: Toby... if you don't stop shouting I'll throw you out into the vacuum of space, and LAST TIME I CHECKED THAT'S NOT A PENGUIN'S NATURAL HABITAT!

Toby [40]: Wow. Just... wow, ya know?

Reyna [50]: You shout, I shout. Now, where was I... We need to destroy this convoy ASAP before they can cause any more trouble.

Toby [60]: LET THE HEAVENS RAIN WITH OUR ENEMIES' BLOOD! (coughing) Does anyone have a glass of water?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_B

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: This is Truffles LeReaux, captain of this ship. All intruders will be... oh, you're back. That's... unexpected. Hmm.

Reyna [20]: You again?

Thaddeus Wishingbone [30]: Audible sigh. These ships were supposed to be untrackable. Damn Thrall engineers, but I used the...

Toby [40]: I'LL MURDER YOU, YOU SLIPPERY MECH STEALER!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [50]: Rude!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [60]: So, it's actually more cost-effective for me if you lower your weapons, assume the acceptance-of-mortality position, and simply let my minions wash over you like a shower of murder. Oooh! Fun fact, “Shower of Murder” was my college ska band. Would you like to hear our stuff sometime? Let me see if I've got a track I can cue up... hang on, hang on, hang on.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_C

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: (singing) Fala, la-dee dee la... it was love that spurred her... La-la-ladee dee la... into the shower of murder!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Encore, thank you. Yeah, I'm very good. Very good.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_D

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Our title track was called Purple Biscuit Dagger, and it was highly regarded on the blogosphere. I'm sure you've heard of it.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_E

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Oooh, when I take over Solus, I'll probably get Shower of Murder back together and have, like, a big show. I'd invite you but you won't be able to attend because you'll be floating in the cold vacuum of space where there's no sound... ooh, bummer.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_F1

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Ugh, you again? Why are you bothering me, Reyna? Ugh!

Reyna [20]: Is this fool serious?

Thaddeus Wishingbone [30]: Very serious. Very, VERY serious. Very very very VERY --

Toby [40]: I am going to murder you if you say very one more time.

Thaddeus Wishingbone [50]: Verrrrrry.

Toby [60]: Permission to yell.

Reyna [70]: Permission granted.

Toby [80]: YOU'RE GONNA DIE!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_F2

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: I like you Rogues. You're sort of messy as an organization, but you're also ruthless and get things done. Wanna join up with me instead of this whole you-trying-to-stop-me-ship-by-ship-charade?

Toby [20]: I would prefer to simply MURDER YOU!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [30]: Suit yourself! Hahahaha! Because it's a mech suit... doy.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_F3

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Uh, because, if you think about it, it's not like you all have an allegiance to anything, and I mean, you live in the Detritus zone, hello, which is just a fancy way of saying trash zone, I mean isn't it? Wouldn't you like a whole planet? Ekkunar, perhaps?

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_F4

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Oh, now you've done it... I'm gonna make Shower of Murder look like a kiddie pool with a dragon – and I don't even know what that means, I'll figure it out after your corpses are in space.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_F5

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: Truffles LeReaux.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_G1

Toby [10]: How'd you steal my suit schematics?!

Thaddeus Wishingbone [20]: Let's just say if you don't cross your Ts, little penguin, all you've got is a bunch of little L's, hahaha! You should know that I'm making an L for loser on my forehead right now, because you are a loser.

Toby [30]: Okay... okay. Seriously. Seriously! NUKE THIS GUY!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_G2

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: I find your fighting sloppy and predictable, but I'm, like, busy so if you could please die now that be very very convenient for me.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_G3

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: I'm not panting, for the record. I'm salivating because I thought I'd treat myself to a strawberry sundae after I murder you... totally not hurt.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_G4

Thaddeus Wishingbone [10]: You can't defeat me, because I am like the sun. At the end of the day I disappear, but I always return... I should put that on a tee-shirt. Laters...

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_H

Toby [10]: Is... is he gone?

Reyna [20]: Don't think so... and this guy's starting to piss me off.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar02_I

Reyna [10]: Alright, onto the next ship, Rogues. We've got a job to do.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar03_A

Pendles [10]: Hallo, everyone! Pendles the cold-blooded assassin at your service!

Toby [20]: Pendles! What're you doing here?

Pendles [30]: Sooo, funny thing, a fellow named... Milky Grontawnamuss hired me to murder you lot.

Toby [40]: But... you're not going to murder us... right?

Pendles [50]: 'Course not! His check bounced.

__________________________________________________________________________________________________

|| SECTION: Nar03_B

Pendles [10]: So Tobes, Reyna told me you're having trouble killin' the fellow who kidnapped you. Well, I'm here to help.

Toby [20]: Oh. Thanks, Pendles.
